name: Quannnic
description: '''Nick Quan''' (born 2004), known professionally as '''Quannnic''' (stylized in [[all lowercase]]), is an American musician. Initially presenting a [[digicore]] sound, they{{efn|Quannnic is [[non-binary gender|non-binary]]<ref name=junkee /> and uses ''[[Singular they|they/them]]'' pronouns.<ref name="stereogum">{{Cite web |last=Enis |first=Eli |date=2023-12-18 |title=TikTok Has Made Shoegaze Bigger Than Ever |url=https://www.stereogum.com/2245469/tiktok-has-made-shoegaze-bigger-than-ever/columns/sounding-board/ |access-date=2024-04-24 |website=[[Stereogum]] |language=en}}</ref>}} began releasing music as Quannnic in late 2020 and released their debut studio album, ''Kenopsia'', in February 2022. A track from the album, "Life Imitates Life", unexpectedly went viral on [[TikTok]] and charted on ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''{{'s}} [[Hot Hard Rock Songs]]. Quannnic's second studio album, ''Stepdream'', was released in November 2023, and they later co-headlined an American tour with [[Jane Remover]]. On Quannnic's musical style, sources mostly described it as [[shoegaze]], with ''Kenopsia'' mixing glitch elements and ''Stepdream'' emo. Their third album, ''[[Warbrained]]'', was released in August 2025.
